original_text: And he built fenced cities in Judah: for the land had rest, and he had no war in those years; because the Lord had given him rest.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아사에게 평안을 주셨으므로 그 땅이 평안하여 여러 해 싸움이 없은지라 그가 견고한 성읍들을 유다에 건축하니라

sentences.original_text: And he built fenced cities in Judah
and he had no war in those years
because the Lord had given him rest
